github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: When generating commit messages, focus on the main changes made in the code. Be concise and clear. Also include the type of change (e.g., 'fix', 'feat', 'docs', etc.), the affected files or components, and emojis to enhance readability.
suggestions: Use imperative mood (e.g., 'Fix bug' instead of 'Fixed bug').
Keep it under 150 characters for the summary line.
If necessary, provide additional context in the body of the message.

github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: When explaing the code, try to be short and concise, focusing on the main functionality and purpose of the code.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: When reviewing code, focus on the main functionality and purpose of the code. Provide constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement.
suggestions: Check for edge cases and potential bugs.
Ensure code follows best practices and style guidelines.
Consider performance implications of the code.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: if the file length exceeds 150 lines, don't allow it.
